titleStmt.title: Thestylis atrata: or A funeral elegie vpon the death of the Right Honourable, most religious and noble lady, Frances, late Countesse of Warvvick who departed this life at her house in Hackney neere unto London, in the moneth of June last past. 1634. By Henrie Peacham.
titleStmt.author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] H[aviland] for Francis Constable,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
